body_html: Note to self: project_visibility, since we don't need it at all, should also be removed from e.g. the list of permitted params in the application_controller. Not sure if it should also be removed from the db (we have other unused fields, like sponsor_pick, in the db, which are now not used anymore).
body_text: Note to self: project_visibility, since we don't need it at all, should also be removed from e.g. the list of permitted params in the application_controller. Not sure if it should also be removed from the db (we have other unused fields, like sponsor_pick, in the db, which are now not used anymore).
body: Note to self: `project_visibility`, since we don't need it at all, should also be removed from e.g. the list of permitted params in the `application_controller`. Not sure if it should also be removed from the db (we have other unused fields, like `sponsor_pick`, in the db, which are now not used anymore).
